0d9cb2cf-230f-4ac5-ac4d-1f3dfbb473b9: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...
3ab6f6f3-d5bc-4b3c-845a-21ab584c8cad: "A person of your status, here...? Please, have mercy on us!"
405d4ebe-a027-4508-81a0-2dd41a7dcdf8: The wall is black with dirt and soot.
58948d8f-3799-4926-ab5a-8943f1123be6: The voices belonging to the many residents of the lower levels merge into a single humming noise â€” unnerving and oppressive, much like the surrounding catacombs.
65e143ae-bd29-45ea-823b-09f5b6e19903: You feel a slight prickling sensation at the back of your head. The barrier between the worlds has grown so thin here that you can feel a breeze coming from the other side...
71337a2c-8fd4-43b6-9705-0b7c86f28990: A toxic flow of murky liquid comes down from the higher levels via ancient, rusted pipes.
9270a8f5-dfc9-4c11-8839-48bd4e677a2d: Shoddy utensils, flimsy stools, and greasy mattresses stand by the entrance, strewn with rags. This must be someone's pitiful dwelling.
9bb7bea6-9b91-46b4-99a7-76412e35bf03: Other than the fact that the stains on this dirty wall resemble a symbol of some kind, you do not see anything of note.
d2999687-3cc3-46d6-81f3-e0bfceb58e06: "Huh? Who's there? That terrifying laughter... that wasn't you, was it...?"
e4fd49ee-fa23-4ab0-91ab-2dd5e3fea4b3: Under the layer of soot and grime, you notice an unholy symbol scratched into the wall, and one look at it is enough to make you nauseous. Someone is watching you.
